import React from 'react' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import axios from 'axios' function Form(){ const url = 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/create' const {register, handleSubmit,errors} = useForm() if(window.confirm('Are you sure to delete this record?')){ const onSubmit = (data) => { axios.post(url,data) .then(function(response){ console.log(response) alert('Succefully Created!') window.location.reload(); }) .catch(function(error){ console.log(error) }) } } return (

Create Card

{errors.title && This field is required}
{errors.description && This field is required}
) } export default Form
